::Slayer::

Slayer growls, looking at his enemy. He knew that they were both near 
stasis lock, but it was still a pity to let a victim go...

"Agreed," Slayer says after some consideration. Aside from his 
damages, there was something in him that didn't want to finish this 
fight. He growls. He would have to check his systems later, these 
acts of mercy were not good, "I shall kill you next time, then."

Turning around, Slayer transforms into a wolf, boosters emerging from 
his sides and sending him flying back to the Trainer base.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> Lunarpine Howls loudly as the rifle hits him in the stomoch. He 
curls 
> up into a fetal position until he hit the ground. Now both bots had 
a 
> critical wound that needed tending as soon as possible. If he took 
> another solid shot like that he might not make it back for repairs. 
> (He was to busy fighting Slayer to notice how badly the Ark was 
> damaged.) But the same went for Slayer, if he didn't get back to 
> wherever his base was he'd gointo stasis lock too. The fight was 
> meaningless right now, if it continued both would cease to 
function. 
> Lunarpine transformed to full wolf mode to save energy and speed up 
> repairs. He took a defensive stance in front of Slayer and started 
a 
> stareing contest. "This is turning senseless. If we both stay out 
> here we're both dead if we go our seperate ways we might live to 
pick 
> this up another day." He stepped back a few steps ready to move at 
a 
> moments notice. "We're to evenly matched, I see that now, how about 
a 
> rain check till we meet again?"
